Package org.daisy.dotify.api.tasks

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TaskGroup
    a task group is a file/fileset conversion unit.
    TaskGroupFactory
    Provides an interface for task group factories.
    TaskGroupFactoryMakerService
    Provides an interface for a TaskGroupFactoryMaker service.
    TaskSystem
    TaskSystem is an interface used when compiling a series of InternalTasks that may require both global Transformer parameters and individual constructor arguments.
    TaskSystemFactory
    Provides an interface for task system factories.
    TaskSystemFactoryMakerService
    Provides an interface for a TaskSystemFactoryMaker service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExpandingTask
    Provides an abstract base for expanding tasks.
    InternalTask
    Base class for internal tasks.
    ReadOnlyTask
    Provides an abstract base for read only tasks.
    ReadWriteTask
    Provides an abstract base for read/write tasks.
    TaskGroupSpecification  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InternalTaskException
    An InternalTaskException is an exception that indicates conditions in an InternalTask that a reasonable application might want to catch.
    TaskSystemException
    A TaskSystemException is an exception that indicates conditions in a TaskSystem that a reasonable application might want to catch.
    TaskSystemFactoryException
    A TaskSystemFactoryException is an exception that indicates conditions in a TaskSystemFactory that a reasonable application might want to catch.
